ExternalServiceRegistration.label: CursorExample
ExternalServiceRegistration.schema: openapi: 3.0.1 info: title: "@AuraEnabled Apex method APIs" version: 1.0.0 description: Collection of requested @AuraEnabled Apex method APIs x-betaInfo: OpenAPI documents generated from Apex classes using @AuraEnabled annotations are in beta. servers: - url: /services/aura-controllers/custom paths: /CursorExample/pagination: description: Default description for the path. post: description: Default description for the operation. operationId: pagination requestBody: description: Default description for the requestBody. required: false content: application/json: schema: type: object properties: position: type: integer format: int32 lastIndex: type: integer format: int32 responses: "200": description: Status Code 200 content: application/json: schema: type: array items: type: object components: schemas: {}
